sentence.Network_en: His gruff exterior concealed one of the kindest hearts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他粗暴的外表下藏着一颗非常善良的心。

sentence.Network_en: He picked up the phone expecting to hear the chairman's gruff voice.
sentence.Network_cn: 他拿起电话，心想会听到主席粗哑的嗓音。

sentence.Network_en: He could be gruff and monosyllabic.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 同义词总结大全 ... tyrant n． 暴君，残暴之人 | gruff adj 粗暴的 oschlocracy n 暴民统治.
PETS、自考英语-阅（一）L2—20[旺旺英语论坛] ... 1. barbaric 野蛮的 2. gruff 粗鲁的 3. polish 修养、优雅.
坏的-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 腐坏的 addle 脾气坏的 gruff 更坏的事 worse.
粗涩何意_百度知道 ... “Coarse” 粗的,粗糙的 “gruff” 粗哑的；嘶哑的 “hoarse” 嘶哑的.

list.abs: His gruff manner made me angry ., 他粗暴的态度让我生气.
the gruff bean , he humorous is not actually prominent , but he did belonged to his humor , although seemed very stupid .憨豆，他的幽默其实并不突出，但是他做了属于自己的幽默，尽管看上去很愚蠢。
A gruff squire on horseback with shiny topboots ., 一个粗暴的绅士 , 足登锃亮的高统马靴 , 跨在马背上.
He could only roar in a gruff voice ., 他仅能以沙哑的声音吼叫着.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'coarse-grained'): from Flemish and Dutch grof 'coarse, rude', of West Germanic origin

entry.def: A gruff voice sounds low and rough.

example.ex: He picked up the phone expecting to hear the chairman's  gruff voice.
example.tran: 他拿起电话，心想会听到主席粗哑的嗓音。

entry.def: If you describe someone as gruff, you mean that they seem rather unfriendly or bad-tempered.

example.ex: His gruff exterior concealed one of the kindest hearts.
example.tran: 他粗暴的外表下藏着一颗非常善良的心。

means.word_mean: 2. deep and harsh sounding as if from shouting or illness or emotion;

sentences.sentence: "makes all the instruments sound powerful but husky"- Virgil Thomson

auth_sentence.content: Speaking in the gruff voice of deep emotion.

auth_sentence.content: His buildings are gruff, sculptural and statuesque.
